learning_history.pattern_identified: Over-weighted course experience (1 win) over superior value metrics (9 vs 7 score, 23.5% vs 14.4% edge)
learnings: Value score should be PRIMARY factor (40% weight)
Edge percentage >8% difference requires favoring higher value
Progressive form (U-2-1) can beat plateau form (1-1-X)
Small fields (≤5): favorites often over-bet, favor value at 3-5 odds
Course wins helpful but NOT decisive when value gap is significant
learning_history.expected_impact: Should now select horses with superior value metrics over favorites with course advantages
learning_history.verification_metric: Track if future picks favor value_score 9 over value_score 7 regardless of course wins
